body_text: I did not bother documenting the changes to the driver because I'm not entirely sure if anyone is using the docs for the driver. If they're infrequently used, I'd rather have the docs be in code comments near the functions, and pulled in to the Sphinx docs via sphinx-js or something. They'd be kept in better sync, at least.

title: Document the opt-out-study action and missing filter expression fields.
body: I did not bother documenting the changes to the driver because I'm not entirely sure if anyone is using the docs for the driver. If they're infrequently used, I'd rather have the docs be in code comments near the functions, and pulled in to the Sphinx docs via sphinx-js or something. They'd be kept in better sync, at least.
